version_description: Fixed localization issues in the driver menu and at the company creation screen
Fixed localization issues in the driver menu and at the company creation screen

New content:

* Japanese and Russian language support enabled
* Winter vegetation added
* Winter terrain texture added

Fixes:

* Fixed several localization issues
* Updated several UI elements
* Error with the "Bank" button during tutorial fixed
* Cooling truck/trailer sticking bug fixed
* Internal game initialization bug fixed
* Job lightpillar object texture & scaling fixed
* Overall game popup sizes changed to fit new supported languages

New content:
• Spring is Back!
• 2 new trucks for your fleet:
o Rotolo K1584S
o Rotolo A27234S
• Immersive Mode implemented: Hide Navigation Bars when not in use
• New Languages
o Simplified Chinese
o Traditional Chinese
o Finnish
o Swedish
o Norwegian
o Dutch
o Czech

Bugfixes:
• Overlapping font labels in several pop-ups
• Chinese font issue in headers and country labels for Streetmap View
• java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
• Typing Smileys
• invisible collision in tunnel in geneva fixed
• Chinese, Russian, Greece, Finnish and Turkish are supported in terms of input characters
